channel.title: Help!
channel.description: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at ItemHandler.spawnItem(ItemHandler.java:102) at ItemHandler.addItem(ItemHandler.java:94) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:486) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItems(NPCHandler.java:376) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:300) at server.main(server.java:46)[/code] i get this error every 30 mins or so and it crashes server any1 kno how to fix this bug??[br][size=1]Posted at: September 24, 2006, 11:00:04 PM[/size][hr]any 1 know how to fix this bug??

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

i had the exact same thing b4 and someone told me that i had put something incorrect in the npc.handler

so by sheer coincedence i put this into my compiler:
@echo on
title My Updater
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe” server
pause

and ran it, then replaced the ‘on’ with an off, and now it works

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
